replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(push)] [npc.her] [npc.feet] into the leather boots and [npc.verb(pull)] them up to [npc.her] knee.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(push)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet] into the leather boots and [npc.verb(pull)] them up to [npc2.her] knee.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(push)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet] into the leather boots and [npc.verb(yank)] them up to [npc2.her] knee.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the tops of [npc.her] leather boots before tugging them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the tops of [npc2.namePos] leather boots before tugging them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] down the tops of [npc2.namePos] leather boots before tugging them off.
